# Failure

**Associated Type**

The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Failure : Error
```

## Discussion

Use `Never` if this `Publisher` does not publish errors.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.description: The kind of values published by this publisher.
items.name: Output

title: Failure
